title: Consumer Price Inflation including owner occupiers' housing costs (CPIH)

versions.title: Consumer Prices Index including owner occupiers' housing costs (CPIH)
versions.summary: The Consumer Prices Index (CPI), Consumer Prices Index including owner occupiers' housing costs (CPIH), and owner occupiers' housing costs (OOH) inflation.
versions.description:
CPIH is the most comprehensive measure of inflation. It extends Consumer Prices Index to include a measure of the costs associated with owning, maintaining and living in one's own home, known as owner occupiers' housing costs (OOH), along with council tax. This dataset provides CPI, CPIH, and OOH time series (2012 to latest published month).

The observations show the change in inflation (the percentage change in the index) over the same month in the previous year. For example, the observation for January 2015 shows the change in inflation between January 2015 and January 2014.

columns.name: date
columns.description: The date associated with the observation.

columns.name: CPIH
columns.description: The consumer price index including housing for the given time period.

columns.name: CPI
columns.description: The consumer price index including for the given time period.

columns.name: OOH
columns.description: An index of owner occupiers' housing costs for the given time period.
